org.apache.flink.streaming.util

类 StreamingProgramTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.util.TestLogger
      • org.apache.flink.test.util.TestBaseUtils
        • org.apache.flink.test.util.AbstractTestBase
          • org.apache.flink.streaming.util.StreamingProgramTestBase

  • public abstract class StreamingProgramTestBase
extends AbstractTestBase
    Base class for unit tests that run a single test.

    To write a unit test against this test base, simply extend it and implement the testProgram() method.

    • 嵌套类概要
